description: The central tower of Enies Lobby where CP9 has taken Nico Robin. The tower contains multiple floors where the Straw Hats must battle CP9 agents to rescue their crewmate.

keyEvents.description: Jabra brutally attacks Sogeking with Jusshigan inside one of the tower's corridors.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing battles throughout the tower as the Straw Hats fight to reach Robin.

keyEvents.description: Sanji makes his dramatic entrance, rescuing Sogeking and beginning his battle with Jabra in the tower.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the start of one of the arc's major battles within the Tower of Justice.

keyEvents.description: Zoro and Kaku continue their intense battle in another section of the tower.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the parallel battles occurring throughout the Tower of Justice.

keyEvents.description: Luffy and Rob Lucci continue their brutal fight in the tower.
keyEvents.significance: The climactic battle of the arc continues to unfold within the tower's walls.

description: A judicial island under World Government control, known as the island that never experiences night. It serves as a gateway to the Marine Headquarters and Impel Down prison.

keyEvents.description: Franky rescues Chopper from the waters around Enies Lobby after his Monster Point transformation.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the ongoing rescue efforts throughout the island complex.

keyEvents.description: Franky, guided by Chimney, races through the halls of Enies Lobby toward the Gates of Justice.
keyEvents.significance: The race to intercept Robin before she reaches the Gates of Justice intensifies.
